summary: Mature + Fair skin = Ma Fa Skin  It is a female diffuse texture I made for myself with vram in mind it is 2k . I took what were the better features in my opinion and combined them . I used this in my release of wet bumps and most if any screens you may or may not have seen .
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]   [color=#ff0000]Important[/color][/size]    [size=2]Glorious Perspiration   [/size]s - map is required not whole file or just wetbumps gp   for the diffuse  Ma Fa GP to work correctly .

         Now for the fun :
          Starting it off backwards  credits first , why , to make sure they get read .

     
           [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1674320]Maevan2[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url]  This wouldn't be possible if it weren't for their skin textures .
     
          If it weren't for the authors below we probably would have a rather dull looking female and are what the textures are based off .


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6709]           DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]  
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675]           dimon99[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1098675]           Phygit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/33505]           thepal[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5106]           Female Face Retexture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/496662]           navetsea[/url]

          Neck seam texture resource
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/979887]          Halofarm[/url]

          [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330055]betterbecause[/url] Who's Glorious perspiration resources is part of the Ma  Fa GP texture and was designed when I made  WetBumps GP  and has been    my texture since release.
           [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3329763]xs2reality[/url]    Glorious perspiration was designed around his s -map which makes it part of Ma Fa GP

            Thank you to Alpineyj for the encouragement and testing of many parts of my work .


           Now that is over with now the real fun begins . I designed this texture for my personal use because I wanted a lower weight texture with good detail sort of a have your cake and eat it too . This is a Unp and Unp variant texture I won't be making a cbbe because I don't use it and stuff I am beta testing is based on the 7bunp body . There is no fur.....I use race menu so I can grow it and shave as I please . 

           This a simple texture re placer  comes in two flavors GP and Non GP  if you read credits you know what GP is . Should be compatible with most normals unless there is a despairing deference between resolutions in head and body normals  , if there is a slight difference I recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50329]vwr Neck Seam Fix[/url] . Splitting seams from armors that are not your native body type can't help you with . Each package is Mod Organizer and Nexus Mod Manager ready .


[color=#ff00ff][size=5] Disclaimer :[size=3] [color=#f4f4f4]Tats , Tan lines , and Pubic hair not included . If there is something you want to change or make better let me know or credit me post it yourself . Please all I ask is keep the mod on Nexus . [/color][/size][/size][/color]
author: cald123
